answers.answer: Im addicted to sweets! Its terrible! Im surprised I havent gained more weight! But after every meal i get the biggest craving for anything sweet, cake, pie, milkshakes, candy, cookies, all of the above!:)

I do toooo and im just worried that im gunna fail my glucose test because of all of it but I was also told its ok since im having a girl? Idk but either way I need these next 2 hours to pass so I can go get cookies and a milkshake lol
I'm eating a lot of sweet things too, I had my GTT a few days ago and I haven't heard anything yet... I'm assuming I haven't got gestational diabetes. I don't know how though.
Me too!  I want anything sweet but lately it's really been snowcones
I don't think it will effect your test. I scored like 87 and if you hit 140 you have it!

question: Not a question but OMG I CAN NOT GET ENOUGH OF SWEETS!!!!!! all ive been wanting lately is chocolat chip cookies and publix frosting.  But literally I'll eat anything sweet and burgers!! Sorry im soo hungry right now and thats all I can think about is soft bake chocolate chip cookies and burgers lol
title: SWEETS!!!
